snippet: Programs at U.C.L.A. and Columbia keep health professionals and those entering the field up to date on the issues surrounding the Affordable Care Act.
abstract: University of California, Los Angeles and Columbia University are offering programs aimed at keeping health professionals abreast of changes stemming from Affordable Care Act; changes may lead to new career opportunities for professionals with best understanding of law and how it is being put into practice.
lead_paragraph: Programs at U.C.L.A. and Columbia keep health professionals and those entering the field up to date on the issues surrounding the Affordable Care Act.

headline.main: New Health Law Is Sending Many Back to School
headline.print_headline: New Health Law Is Sending Many Back to School

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
keywords.name: subject
